# ggdcm

## Usage
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggdcm)
library(ggdag)
library(dagitty)
dag.dcm  <- dagify(
 x1 ~ Attr1 + Attr2,
 x2 ~ Attr1,
 x3 ~ Attr1 + Attr2,
 x4 ~ Attr2 + Attr1,
 x5 ~ Attr2,
 x6 ~ Attr2 + Attr1,
 x7 ~ Attr2,
 labels = c(Attr1 = "Multiplication", Attr2 = "Minus")
)
ggdcm(.tdy_dag = dag.dcm, use_labels = "label", int.vars = paste0("x", 1:7))
```

```{r}
dtmrSyntax = dagify(

I8c ~ APP,
I9 ~ RU,
I10a ~ MC,
I10b ~ RU + MC,
I10c ~ RU + MC,
I11 ~ RU,
I12 ~ RU,
I13 ~ PI + MC,
I14 ~ RU + MC,
I15a ~ PI + MC,
I15b ~ PI,
I15c ~ PI,
I16 ~ RU,
I17 ~ PI,
I18 ~ RU + PI,

)

int.varsname <- c( "I1", "I2", "I3", "I4", "I5", "I6", "I7", "I8a", "I8b", "I8c", "I9", "I10a", "I10b", "I10c", "I11", "I12", "I13", "I14", "I15a", "I15b", "I15c", "I16", "I17", "I18", "I21", "I22" )
```
